connector.description:
Send data to Kafka topics on an insecure broker.

The Kamelet is able to understand the following headers to be set:

- `key` / `ce-key`: as message key

- `partition-key` / `ce-partition-key`: as message partition key

Both the headers are optional.

camel.kamelet.kafka-not-secured-sink.top.name: camel.kamelet.kafka-not-secured-sink.topic
camel.kamelet.kafka-not-secured-sink.top.description: Comma separated list of Kafka topic names

camel.kamelet.kafka-not-secured-sink.bro.name: camel.kamelet.kafka-not-secured-sink.brokers
camel.kamelet.kafka-not-secured-sink.bro.description: Comma separated list of Kafka Broker URLs
